io.fries.reflection.metadata

Class ClassMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.fries.reflection.metadata.ResourceMetadata
      • io.fries.reflection.metadata.ClassMetadata

  • public class ClassMetadata
extends ResourceMetadata
    Simple object storing a class' metadata. Can be used to load the class into its ClassLoader using the load() method.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClassMetadata(java.lang.String resourceName, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Create a new ClassMetadata object.

    • Method Summary

      java.lang.String getSimpleName() 
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Class<?>> load()
      Load the current class into its class loader.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class io.fries.reflection.metadata.ResourceMetadata

        create, equals, getResource, getUrl, hashCode

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, finalize, getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassMetadata

        public ClassMetadata(java.lang.String resourceName,
                     java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Create a new ClassMetadata object. While load() has not been called, the class is not loaded into the class loader and thus no reference to it is held in any way.
        Parameters:
        resourceName - The complete name of this resource.
        classLoader - The ClassLoader object to which this resource is bound.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Class<?>> load()
        Load the current class into its class loader.
        Returns:
        An Optional of the Class<?> object resulting of the class loader operation.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        The fully qualified class name.

      • getPackage

        public java.lang.String getPackage()
        Returns:
        The name of the package in which the class is located.

      • getSimpleName

        public java.lang.String getSimpleName()
        Returns:
        The simple name of the class (without its package name).

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class ResourceMetadata
